footer.description: We specialize in offering luxury rental cars at affordable prices. Our collection includes BMWs, Mercedes Benz, and many more!

aboutus.aboutUsDescription: We are a specialized team committed to providing reliable car rental services. One of the advantages of renting a car from us is offering competitive and transparent prices. By providing services such as comprehensive insurance...

MainContent.enjoyLife: Enjoy your life with our comfortable cars.
MainContent.carentReady: Carent is ready to serve the best experience in car rental.

premiumServices.title: Our Premium Services
premiumServices.servicesDescription: Carent is a reputable car rental company that offers a wide range of useful services for every taste.

24HoursSupport.title: 24 Hours Support
24HoursSupport.description: We support you all hours of the day.

qualifiedAssurance.title: Qualified Assurance
qualifiedAssurance.description: All cars have a valid insurance.

gpsOnCars.title: GPS on Cars
gpsOnCars.description: All cars are equipped with GPS navigation system.

kristinWatson.name: Kristin Watson
kristinWatson.quote: I rented a car for a one-week trip from Carnet on the recommendation of my friend. Actually, I am satisfied with them.

robertFox.name: Robert Fox
robertFox.quote: During my last trip, I used a Carent sport car. The car was completely clean and had enough gas!
